books.name: The Fellowship of the Ring
books.author: J. R. R. Tolkien
books.ben_review: Phenomenal High Fantasy Epic, has faced and conquered the tales of time, one of the best books ever written in the best trilogy of all time.
books.description: The Fellowship of the Ring is the first in the fantasy epic, Lord of the Rings, written by British author JRR Tolkien.

books.name: Red Rising
books.author: Pierce Brown
books.ben_review: Sci-fi Epic meets Game of Thrones meets Hunger Games. Great series, with twists and turns at every corner
